actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution providing for the compensation of members of the Commission on the Operation of the Senate.

summary.text: Provides that any member of the Commission on the Operation of the Senate who is an officer or employee of the United States shall serve without additional compensation, but shall continue to receive the salary of his regular position. Entitles such individuals to reimbursement for transportation.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the compensation of members of the Commission on the Operation of the Senate.
